5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said two rak'ahs of the noon prayer and then gave salutation when a man from Band Sulaim came to him and said: Messenger of Allah. has the prayer been shortened, or have you forgotten? -and the rest of the hadith is the same

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّهْوِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالسُّجُودِ لَهُ
chapter.eng-name: As-Sahw (forgetfulness) in prayer and prostrating to compensate for it
